mapper.select: select a.id,a.id as weibo_id,a.create_time,a.member_id as 'member.id',b.name as 'member.name',b.avatar as 'member.avatar',b.introduce as 'member.introduce', a.type,a.content,a.favor,a.status,(select count(id) from tbl_weibo_comment as d where d.weibo_id=a.id) commentCount, (CASE WHEN (SELECT id FROM tbl_weibo_favor WHERE weibo_id=#{id} AND member_id=#{loginMemberId}) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) isFavor from tbl_weibo a left join tbl_member b on a.member_id = b.id where a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_weibo (create_time, member_id, type, content) VALUES (now(),#{memberId},#{type},#{content})
mapper.select: select a.id,a.create_time,a.member_id as 'member.id',b.name as 'member.name',b.avatar as 'member.avatar', a.type,a.content,a.favor,a.status,(select count(id) from tbl_weibo_comment as d where d.weibo_id=a.id) commentCount, (CASE WHEN (SELECT id FROM tbl_weibo_favor WHERE weibo_id=a.id AND member_id=#{loginMemberId}) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) isFavor from tbl_weibo a left join tbl_member b on a.member_id = b.id where date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(a.create_time) order by commentCount DESC,a.id desc limit 0,20
mapper.update: update tbl_weibo set favor = favor + #{num} where id = #{id}
